mapper.select: SELECT exhibitionId , exhibitionTitleKor , exhibitionTitleEng , openingTerm , firstOpeningYear , openingCountry , openingCity , exhibitionHall , sponsor , createdDate , updatedDate , dataOffer FROM c6_exhibition where exhibitionTitleKor like '%' || #{searchText} || '%' or exhibitionTitleEng like '%' || #{searchText} || '%' or openingCountry like '%' || #{searchText} || '%' or openingCity like '%' || #{searchText} || '%' or openingTerm like '%' || #{searchText} || '%' ORDER BY openingTerm DESC

SELECT exhibitionId , exhibitionTitleKor , exhibitionTitleEng , openingTerm , firstOpeningYear , openingCountry , openingCity , exhibitionHall , sponsor , createdDate , updatedDate , dataOffer from( select * from c6_exhibition order by openingTerm DESC ) where rownum < 13

SELECT exhibitionId , exhibitionTitleKor , exhibitionTitleEng , openingTerm , firstOpeningYear , openingCountry , openingCity , exhibitionHall ,sponsor , createdDate , updatedDate , dataOffer FROM c6_exhibition WHERE exhibitionId = #{selectedCountry}
select count(*) from c6_exhibition where openingCountry = #{selectedCountry}
